lenders.name: Kiva B4B
lenders.loan_because: Advanta was started in 1951 with $30 in seed money. Jack Alter, a Philadelphia school teacher, wanted to help fellow teachers get access to capital. Advanta learned early on that an entrepreneur with a little bit of money can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: The Kiva B4B Project is a collaboration between Kiva and Advanta Bank Corp.  It encourages U.S. based businesses to support entrepreneurs in the developing world.  For more information, visit www.kivab4b.org

lenders.name: Global Kids: LICHS, NYC
lenders.occupation: Global Kids: 30 students at LIC High School, NYC
lenders.loan_because:
WE WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD!! 

Global Kids runs various after school programs  at Long Island City High School in Queens, New York.  

In general we want to inspire young people to develop their leadership capacities to become the best they can be.

Our program with freshmen students is focused on community service activities and has proven to be a positive and successful program. 

On average, 15-20 students consistently attend the program week-to-week. 

 In January Global Kids collaborated with Stephen Shames Foundation to invite two Ugandan child soldiers as special guest to LIC HS. Katongole Godfrey and Ojok Charles were guest speakers during or workshop, they met with the students and shared their life experiences with the group. Excited and filled with hope, the students have decided to support small business entrepreneurs in third world countries through Kiva.org, an organization focused on helping people around the world using microfinance loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Global Kids (GK) is an organisation working in NYC high schools. We are committed to transforming urban youth into successful students as well as global and community leaders. Using interactive and experiential methods to educate youth about critical international and foreign policy issues, GK provides students with opportunities for civic and global engagement.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that I am called to do so.  I have been given much, more than I deserve and it is my privilege to help others!

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe the real solution to poverty is not taking care of people, but helping them take care of themselves (which is exactly what I can do through Kiva)

lenders.name: Tegwyn
lenders.loan_because: I feel like even though I am 13 years old, if I can change even in one persons life, I can change the world. And that gives me hope.
lenders.occupational_info: Lending helps me make a difference.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I examine the body looking for cancer

lenders.name: Kristin Taliaferro
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a break now and again and I'm happy to help. Plus, I'm impressed with all of the shining faces I see here and the enterprising people trying really hard to make ends meet, feed their families or run a business.  Life isn't a monopoly game.  We weren't all born with the same opportunities.  So, it's important to level the field by helping out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am excited about the way the recipients of these loans must feel when they realize a total stranger helped them out.  It makes the world feel smaller and gives everyone (the giver and receiver) a sense of magic in the world.....

lenders.name: Gilles
lenders.loan_because: I prefer loans compared to gifts because it encourages initiative and I am sure that the people we support are proud of being able to make a living for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I was an electronics technician for 34 years working at an international airport. I am now retired since 2005.

lenders.loan_because: I'm bored.

lenders.name: Newark Academy
lenders.loan_because: We are a student-run initiative within our school community.  Part of our school's mission-statement is to promote "Global Citizenship," and we feel that Kiva's efforts are a fantastic way to stress the importance of real-world philanthropy.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students who fund-raise as a collective in order to be able to contribute to Kiva's entrepreneurs.  Led by Mike Mszański and Shanel Mehta, both Newark Academy class of 2009.

lenders.loan_because: Life is about giving back and helping others.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with a love of business and it has been one of the most liberating experiences. I know how risky it is...and how it feels when you succeed. I also give because my motto is "make a living, make a life, and make a difference!"
lenders.occupational_info: I own three businesses. A rental property management / investment firm that manages more than 450 properties, am part owner in a deer processing business, and now have invested in a chocolate shop called 'Never Enough Chocolate".

lenders.name: Michelle & Chris
lenders.loan_because: We've been given so much in our lives and have so many things to be thankful for.  We're trying to do our little part to make things better for someone else.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because:
There's this great story which I have made into my philosophy in life that if you give a person a fish you feed them for a day, but with a fishing rod, their whole life. The problem with charities for me has always been the question you ask yourself, are you giving a fish or the fishing rod. In my view encouraging economic enterprise is the one way guaranteed to lift the unfortunate people of this world out of poverty.  
If I can help people realise their dreams and make a better life for themselves and their families and communities, and not disempower them in the process then I have, at the very least, a moral obligation to do so - but this gives me joy - to share the bounty of living in a prosperous first world country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of a boutique coffee roasting business which imports raw coffee, roasts and blends it, and sells it in Australia.

lenders.name: Shahnaz
lenders.loan_because: It is such a small way to make a HUGE difference in someone's life!

lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs make things happen
lenders.occupational_info: We make simple applications with good design.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: I've always disliked the idea of giving to a large charity where I can't see what happens to my money.  I haven't got the time or resources to personally travel and try and change the world, so Kiva allows me to directly contribute to another person without needing to leave the country.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell rigid packaging (bottles,caps, cans, drums, etc.)

lenders.occupational_info: I work with business owners like yourself. I provide Life, dental and disability insurance for their employees. If an employee dies their families will receive money to help them. If an employee is sick and cannot work we will pay them money to they can still take care of their families. If they have a toothache we will help them pay to treat the toothache

lenders.occupational_info: i run my own business and a bigger scale than most of these people but the principles are the same. I wish you guys the best of luck and success.

lenders.loan_because:
“9 As it is written, He [the benevolent person] scatters abroad; He gives to the poor; His deeds of justice and goodness and kindness and benevolence will go on and endure forever!
10 And [God] Who provides seed for the sower and bread for eating will also provide and multiply your [resources for] sowing and increase the fruits of your righteousness [which manifests itself in active goodness, kindness, and charity].
11 Thus you will be enriched in all things and in every way, so that you can be generous, and [your generosity as it is] administered by us will bring forth thanksgiving to God.” – 2 Corinthians 9:9-11   Amplified Bible (AMP)

I believe that giving from the heart is a gift that benefits both parties at once- For me, helping someone else is a remembrance of where I originated from and how I got here today.

lenders.loan_because: education, trust and believing  in the potential of human beings are three ways in which we can improve the world. Contributing to reducing poverty and with that reducing conflict is definitely a good practical way to lie our lives. After all: The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens.
lenders.occupational_info:
Serving as director general of ebbf (http://ebbf.org), co-founder of HUB Madrid (http://hubmadrid.com), visiting professor of social entrepreneurship at EOI and innovation at IE Business School, judge of BASED at Stanford 

Passionate about connecting individuals to their integrity, creativity and ethics. Inspiring them into action by linking them to other like-minded doers and to their ideas. Help achieve and showing the success that ethical behaviours create in business. Promoting the evolution towards a world which will be organised, act and behave as one country. Where the creativity of the diversity of its citizens will enhance the wellbeing and prosperity of humankind.

lenders.occupational_info: At Dhar Law, LLP, we are working to build a law firm based on community lawyering - the idea that pro bono action, local engagement, and bringing together businesses and nonprofits can make a fundamental changes.  Learn more at http://www.dharlawllp.com

I really like that concept.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am semi-retired. But I have been working as a part-time sales associate at a store called "Seven Shores Trading Co."  The owners are dedicated to using Fair Trade practices when importing goods from around the world. They deal directly with the artisan, or local co-op, whenever possible. 
I have been a volunteer for many years, as a Sunday School teacher, and more recently at Operation Christmas Child. I have encouraged our Sunday School children to give...locally and worldwide. Some of our donations have gone to OCC, Samaritan's Purse, Salvation Army, ROOF, Sleeping Children Around the World, and local charities involving children or teens. 
It is very rewarding to see how generous the children have been. I will be encouraging them to become involved with Kiva in 2008.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a social worker but am now retired.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
I can not do great things.  I can do small things with great love.  

When we help another we make the world a better place.

Peace
lenders.occupational_info: I loan millions of dollars to large companies.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to develop an educational sector for children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a private educationist, teaching and caring for children.

lenders.name: Ruth & Shane
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in people's lives.  We have been blessed with so much -We want to pass on the blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use their computers so that they can help themselves

lenders.name: Double Dog Farm
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the free market to create positive change
lenders.occupational_info: I make little things big

lenders.name: Will and Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We are proud parents.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Pastor of Youth in an urban setting.  My job is to organize and motivate adults to reach out to troubled teens and to share with them who Jesus is.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people have the chance to realize their dreams for a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in health care.

lenders.name: Mike & Laurel
lenders.loan_because: Just doing a small part to change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Bettina
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the love of good friends and family and I believe in paying it forward.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women and families.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who take calls and e-mails from our customers.

lenders.name: Vivia
lenders.loan_because: As someone who was once in need, someone was generous to me.  I want to do the same!
lenders.occupational_info: I study and teach at a university.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: I am making this loan in honor of my mother, Gale Kohlhagen, who recently won her battle with breast cancer (she's the pretty lady in green).  As a tribute to her strength, I am donating this money, and plan to continue donating it to women in need (with a little more added each time) as it is perpetually repaid.

lenders.name: Sardar
lenders.loan_because: I want to raised my business

lenders.name: Brianna
lenders.occupation: child fitness instructor, detox monitor, intel off

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: I can see no greater use for my money than helping someone else help themselves.

lenders.name: Ines
lenders.loan_because: I see it as a way to not only help people who are in need, but with these loans we are helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people succeed...and its always better to give than to receive.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help out more people with a loan than I ever could with a donation of the same amount. Once the loan is repaid, I can reinvest in other people who are working hard to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I do odd jobs for a city's Parks and Recreation program, which helps keep kids active, entertained, and out of trouble. I currently do my work at the city's Aquatic Center and Community Center.

lenders.name: Rani
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the best way to empower and encourage people to become self sufficient.  It amazes me how a small loan can make such an impact on someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: We import metal accessories from a mid-size city in India and sell the products to wedding planners and florists.  The products are made by individual artisans for the exporters.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying psychology and storytelling in order to counsel people.

lenders.name: QinoOne
lenders.loan_because: It feels right to help others who are in need. We also believe in extending the concept of Fair Trade by supporting the people of Bolivia, the country where our quinoa grain comes from.
lenders.occupational_info: We import and distribute French spirits, including Qino One Vodka, made with quinoa and rye.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupation: Office Support for Market Research Company
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and I have heard wonderful things about KIVA.  I look forward to receiving progress reports and hearing from other lenders.  Feel free to contact me.
lenders.occupational_info: Help companies test new products

lenders.name: Fr. Peter
lenders.loan_because: I know that most people in the Third World do NOT want to exist on hand outs. To modify the words of the Chinese proverb a little "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Loan a man money so he can buy a fishing rod and so fish for himself then you feed him for a lifetime".
lenders.occupational_info: To carry out my Christian ministry in whatever direction I am guided.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: it helps.

lenders.name: Kristen Quinn
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky to have great people come into my life when I've needed them most. I simply want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help break the cycle of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly emergency response helicopters.

lenders.name: Riches Family
lenders.occupational_info: Mining

lenders.name: natasha
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to improve their situation.

lenders.name: Siân
lenders.occupational_info: This is a photo of me with Benson and other Zambian farmers and volunteers from Greenpop after a morning planting trees! Greenpop are an amazing group of people who plant thousands of trees in Africa.

lenders.name: Ramin
lenders.loan_because: My dollar goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: always in state of learning

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because:
I first began lending as part of a social change assignment in Melody McMurry's sociology class. I believe in giving others a helping hand up - not a hand out. We can all offer HOPE by Helping Others Prosper Economically.

This year (2012-23) my 4th grade students are in charge of my KIVA account. They put much thought and care into choosing borrowers. It is now March, and they have made 16 loans thus far.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a lifelong learner, and share my new discoveries with my students. They also share their knowledge with me. Together we are learning more about this great planet we live on. :)

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint the insides of peoples home . They pick the colors and I put them on.

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best opportunities to give back that I have come across in a long time.  To play a part in improving the circumstances of another human being is priceless, especially when it is a means to make them self sufficient.  I think it's fantastic!

lenders.name: Gospelchor Michelbach
lenders.loan_because: "Think about his love"

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: it takes money to make money.  I also like that my loan goes to a specific individual with a specific vision and goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I treat mental illness.  The photo shows my helpers who come to work with me.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to apply the proverb: "If you want to help a hungry man don't give him a fish, teach him to fish up"

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business and know how hard it is to make it successful, even when you live in a place with a lot of resources.  I hope in some small way to help others.  Perhaps I may learn something to help my little business in the process.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: What comes around goes around.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: This concept is such a great idea that I had to help.  As others have said, I am blessed with so much that to participate with a small loan (or loans) that will make an incredible difference to someone in another part of the world is the least I can do.

lenders.name: Curtis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poor and I believe microfinance is the best way to assist the poor in a sustainable way, to give them a "hand up instead of a hand out."

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: If my small tiny loan can make bigger dreams happen, then it is a good day!

lenders.name: Jlaine
lenders.loan_because: We believe in a Hand Up over a Hand Out

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: giving is something that is important to me, and through Kiva I can give and continue to give, without feeling like my money could have been wasted or misused.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am working on a financial literacy program called The Secure Student, which teaches teenage students how to make smart decisions with their money in order to be better prepared for the future. I am also going to school and hoping to start up a business of my own when I have the time.

lenders.name: Jacqui
lenders.occupational_info: I help run advertising on the TV, radio, newspaper, and internet so people will know about new products available from my clients

lenders.name: The Hallz
lenders.loan_because: it is a blessing to be able to play some small role in empowering individuals in developing countries!
lenders.occupational_info: We dream up and illustrate ideas to motivate other to purchase things, we teach electrical engineering technology, and we are constantly learning new concepts everyday.

lenders.name: Global Kids in TSL
lenders.occupation: Global Kids: 8 Interns in Teen Second Life
lenders.loan_because: We know how much change can happen if everyday people, and especially teens, make it a priority to care about those who have less opportunity, and know that our loan makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a group of teens from around the world that gather in the online community & virtual world of Second Life.  We're all working to educate our peers about social and global issues that we care about.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I really need and would like to assist others in getting a better lifestyle.
lenders.occupational_info: I design things to make some machines work better.  (Dont be confused by the photo - I am not a real farmer even though I once had some steers which I fed prime lucern and showed to my friends - so they were by definition 'show steers').

lenders.name: Andrea and Jim
lenders.loan_because: It does good ... it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a husband and wife team who use our marketing and communications skills to help banks and insurance companies to sell their products.

lenders.name: Paris & Georgina
lenders.loan_because: we believe in the positive impact a loan can have on someone's life.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: A little loan can go a long way.  With what local lenders charge for interest, it's sometimes impossible for people to pay it back and net a benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: I work building websites on the internet and making applications for Apple's iPhone.

lenders.name: Rose Marie
lenders.loan_because:
To give the less fortunate a chance at success in life.

It is our company thrust to balance corporate profits with social/environmental responsiveness.
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial and residential property sales in the US, China, Phils. and Dubai

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I loan because the life of a student is self-centered. Kiva provides a great outlet to focus on people other than yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently attend school in New England for economics and finance.

lenders.name: Leif
lenders.loan_because:
It is better that a little be given in time, than much when it is too late.
"Somadeva - Kashmir, 1035-1085"

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: If my loan can give these people a chance to gain more economic freedom, its the least that I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: Working on my second degree as a nurse.  One day I hope to work abroad..

lenders.name: Jama Software
lenders.loan_because: We believe in giving back, from the very start.  Even as a high-growth start-up, we're committed to helping other entrepreneurs around the world succeed as we grow.
lenders.occupational_info: We help companies build great products through the use of our Product Delivery Platform called Jama.  For every customer that buys Jama, we set aside marketing dollars to sponsor new Kiva loan recipients each quarter.  Enjoy the journey!

lenders.name: Hsu Kang
lenders.loan_because: I want to be involved in helping others make a change for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a team that helps companies become beautiful.

lenders.name: Soroush / Mike
lenders.loan_because: As a Baha'i I value all races, religions and nations. I am fortunate and wish to share with my brothers and sisters across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired specialist teacher and am now a gallery photographer. I look for interesting compositions, light and color.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: this is the best way to create lasting change.  "Be the change that you want to see in the world." - Gandhi

lenders.name: Scott & Beth
lenders.loan_because: We believe microfinance provides EQUAL opportunities for the lender and borrower.  It really works!
lenders.occupational_info: My company repairs high voltage equipment such as transformers, electric motors, wind turbines and other large electric equipment.  Beth teaches Pre-K ESL (four-year olds) in a public school system.  Her students represent over 15 different languages.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: It's effective, simple and promotes good will and global citizenship.  I have witnessed first hand the awarding of large loans that don't have near the impact of a small loan made directly to an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a director of food services for an international service/finance company.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I care about others.  I love to help people who want to help themselves.  Kiva is a wonderful program for us to lend a helping hand to others.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want agriculture to thrive worldwide, and produce both the quality and quantity food the world needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist producers is marketing their production and managing their risk.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.
lenders.occupational_info: Life is about making it happen in all you do!

lenders.name: Neal Mody
lenders.loan_because: It is the seed thy changes people, families & communities

lenders.name: Pengy
lenders.loan_because: The money will just rot in my bank otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.name: Ursula  & Dylan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their dream a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I

lenders.name: Charm
lenders.loan_because: Matt 25:40  That which you do to the least of my brethren, that you do unto Me.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting my employer with anything that will make his job easier.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Do not neglect to do good and to share what you have, for such sacrifices are pleasing to God.  - Hebrews 13:16

lenders.name: Dara
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a website on the Internet that helps give free advice to anyone who wants it.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers and keep them up and running

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am delighted by the fact that I can play a part in changing someone's future and allow them to provide for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the local university assisting students.  I have a 20 year old daughter and an 18 year old son who are both studying at university.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: The disparity that exists in the world is personally unconscionable to me.

lenders.name: Calvin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying to make a difference...

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: My sister gave us a Kiva gift certificate two Christmas' ago. It is a gift that continues to give.

lenders.name: Reneé & Jason
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make the world a better place.  We have such an abundance of everything in America while people and families in other countries go with out.  God has blessed us in our lives and we would like to share that with others!
lenders.occupational_info: Jason is an IT Professional which means he works on and maintains computers and servers a business needs to operate.  Reneé works as a photographer, taking pictures of families, kids, weddings, and pets. She also volunteers at an Aquarium, teaching the public about the local animals that live in the Pacific Ocean off of San Diego. She is currently attending college fulltime to become a Middle School Science teacher.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: one must practice what they preach.
lenders.occupational_info: I study international development and urban planning.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to teach my child to get involved with the world. Lead by example.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager for a great company that makes loans and creates savings oppertunites for its members. I work for a credit union.

lenders.name: patrick
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Somsak
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people's goodwill to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Adrianne M
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a Bachelor of Science degree in Information Systems Management, and am currently working full-time towards a Master of Science degree in Information Technology.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: This is the most direct way I can help those who need it the most.

lenders.name: Rafael
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Delivering packages to people.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: it makes such a large impact not only for the one your lending to but  for everyone around them,.

lenders.name: Mark and Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to use a small amount of money to assist others to benefit themselves and their societies without introducing dependencies.
lenders.occupational_info: I design computer software to support space vehicles.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: As a pharmacist I take for granted the availability of medicines and other basic healthcare.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell medicines to help heal sick people.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I'm Lucky, God has truly blessed me - but I grew up poor.  People helped me when I needed it; now its my turn to help others. Plus, I have worked on Overseas Aid Programs and know the difference it makes.
lenders.occupational_info: Self Employed; Play the Stock Market and run Internet Businesses.

lenders.name: yusek
lenders.loan_because: Por que me gusta ayudar a la gente
lenders.occupational_info: Soy un programador...

lenders.name: Eryn
lenders.loan_because: My very generous brother introduced me to Kiva by getting me a credit for my birthday this year.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist in the designing, the drawing and the construction administration of buildings and remodeling of buildings.

lenders.name: Olson Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help entrepreneurs get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the financial computer systems for a small city in Ontario, Canada.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: ...I'm very grateful for the fact that my own financial problems are getting better. Because I had someone to help me out a little and now I'd like to help others who maybe do not have this opportunity

lenders.name: Corinne
lenders.loan_because: It makes a positive change in people's circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing the operations of a global public opinion research company that gives voice to people around the world.

lenders.name: FURIO
lenders.loan_because: Mi piace pensare che con l'aiuto di tutti noi  qualcuno possa realizzare il proprio sogno...
lenders.occupational_info: Mi occupo di Pubbliche Relazioni e sviluppo lavoro on line tramite il mio sito...mi piacerebbe entrare in contatto con più persone possibili per realizzare progetti importanti

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It is good to help anyone who is willing to work and improve themselves.  I was helped, so I help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell houses after fixing them up.  I also rent out apartments, many to the poorer folks who need a break.

lenders.name: Jo-ellen
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to and I should!

lenders.name: Kaylyn
lenders.loan_because: Compared to people living in poverty I have abundant wealth.  For the $25 I only have to skip lunch out 2 times...a pretty easy sacrifice.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a graphic design & marketing company.  We create print and online material for real estate companies, outdoors companies, and technology companies.

lenders.name: Puja
lenders.loan_because: it's one of the best uses of my money.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: Lending has been my profession.  I know how beneficial it is to the individual and the community when a loan enables someone to improve their lot in life, thereby improving the community.  I get a tremendous amount of satisfaction out of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the CEO of a credit union that serves the residents of a specific geographic region in the Southwestern United States.  The Credit Union has 45 employees dedicated to improving the lives of those people and businesses that we serve.  I am the lucky one who gets to direct our resources to accomplish goals that we set with our Board of Directors.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Each one reach one, each one teach one.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping nonprofits figure out how to maximize their use of technology in order to fullfill their organizations' missions.

lenders.name: tom
lenders.loan_because: i need more money to buy a laptop and some computers for my studio editing. to add some quality to my work  so as to attract more customer to my bussiness.
lenders.occupational_info: i deals in video recording, photographingand also editing

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: God is great and He has been very good to me. I want to share His goodness with others.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to maintain a high standard of quality and service and teach others how to do the same in order to improve the quality of life for everyone.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Small business owners all over the world can make a nice living with the help of small loans, and they can build stronger businesses for themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I make maps accessible to people who come into our  library. We have maps of the entire world, but we specialize in the state of Georgia and the USA.

lenders.name: Lone
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed that i can help other woman to  get independent and I love to help children with education.  Please look at : http://www.galileeschool.org/
lenders.occupational_info: secretary - writing journals for doctors in a large hospital.

lenders.name: Elissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my students that every person can make a big difference in the lives of others, a lesson I hope I can practice in my life every day.

lenders.name: Bret
lenders.loan_because: "insert something corny here"

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to make a huge impact on another person's life with such a small amount of money. The reward for me is humble satisfaction, knowing  that I can do something positive! And I have a big smile in my heart right now.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and train people how to make money a really fun way with premium Health and Wellness Products (Vegan certified)

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Help others use the computer system to be more efficient.

lenders.name: Rodney
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!

lenders.name: B.G.
lenders.loan_because: The talking dogs in my head told me to.  Really.    Some talking dogs urge you to do terrible things, my talking dogs tell me to be kind to my neighbors.  Seriously.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is a real pain in the ass!  Do you understand your ass being in pain?  It's as if my mother-in-law kicked me in it!

I WISH I was born RICH instead of GOOD LOOKING!  (Then I could lend more money!)

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy and it really helps make a difference to someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Everything that goes with being a wife and mother

lenders.name: Cartwright
lenders.loan_because: Some students at Cartwright Elementary participated in an after school service academy.  The students organized a raffle to raise money for Kiva.  These students have learned how important it is to help others around the world.
